wikipedia_page.main: Ian Lockie Michael (1915–2014) was a British academic who was the founding Vice-Chancellor of the University of Malawi.

response: **Ian Michael, 99, academic, Vice-Chancellor of the University of Malawi (1964–1973).
*Ian Michael, 99, British academic, Vice-Chancellor of the University of Malawi (1964–1973).University of Malawi's first vice chancellor dies aged 99  (death announced on this date)
